title: Which college should I choose out of these (Urgent, it's the last day of KCET second extended round option entry)
content:
I'm not sure which one I should choose between the two. I am a resident of Mysore by the way.

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/16ptr4l)

comments.body: PES EC campus placement happens with main RR campus so, obviously it'll be better

Sjce >> pesu ec anyday man 
College life is wayy better in sjce Mysore than in ec campus
